level.heading: Establishment of lead-based paint abatement and control program.
Emergency Act Amendments
level.text: For temporary amendment of section, see § 101 of the Omnibus Budget Support Congressional Review Emergency Act of 1995 (D.C. Act 11-124, July 27, 1995, 42 DCR 4160).

level.heading: Legislative History of Laws
level.text: For legislative history of D.C. Law 11-221, see Historical and Statutory Notes following § 8-115.01.

level.heading: Delegation of Authority
level.text: Delegation of authority pursuant to D.C. Law 11-221 the "Lead-Based Paint Abatement and Control Act of 1996", see Mayor's Order 97-118, June 25, 1997 (44 DCR 4137).
